title: Two Sum
description: Given an array nums and a target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to the target.
hints: Use a hashmap to store values and indices.

title: Reverse Integer
description: Reverse digits of a 32-bit signed integer. Return 0 if it overflows.

title: Palindrome Number
description: Determine whether an integer is a palindrome without converting it to a string.

title: Roman to Integer
description: Convert a Roman numeral string to an integer.
hints: Subtract if a smaller value appears before a larger one.

title: Longest Common Prefix
description: Find the longest common prefix among an array of strings.

title: Valid Parentheses
description: Return true if parentheses string is valid.

title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
description: Merge two sorted linked lists and return the new sorted list.

title: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
description: Remove duplicates in-place and return the number of unique elements.

title: Search Insert Position
description: Find the index at which target should be inserted.

title: Maximum Subarray
description: Find the contiguous subarray with the largest sum.

title: Climbing Stairs
description: You can climb 1 or 2 steps at a time. How many distinct ways to reach step n?

title: Valid Palindrome
description: Check if a string is a palindrome, ignoring non-alphanumeric characters.

test_cases.input: s='A man, a plan, a canal: Panama'

title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
description: Find the maximum profit from a single buy-sell.
hints: Track minimum price as you go.

title: Binary Search
description: Return the index of target using binary search.

title: Move Zeroes
description: Move all zeroes to the end while maintaining relative order.

title: Add Binary
description: Add two binary strings and return their sum as a binary string.

title: Majority Element
description: Return the element that appears more than n/2 times.

title: Linked List Cycle
description: Detect if a linked list contains a cycle.

title: Middle of Linked List
description: Return the middle node of a linked list.

title: Fizz Buzz
description: Return a list of strings from 1 to n following FizzBuzz rules.
